validator module¶

Module that validates user input Has various functions that check integer, float, is number in range, is entry contained in

Functions continue to prompt until input is valid

validator.enter_a_float(prompt)¶
validator.enter_an_integer(prompt)¶
validator.enter_correct_type(prompt, type_function)¶
validator.enter_float_in_range(prompt, low, high)¶
validator.enter_integer_in_range(prompt, low, high)¶
validator.enter_number_in_range(prompt, low, high, entry_function)¶
validator.enter_valid_character(prompt, set_of_valid_chars: str, ignore_case=True)¶
validator.main()¶
